name: Pony Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Turn to a little horse in the magic world of Pony Survival Simulator 3D.

Live the life of the animal. Ride across lovely landscapes. Complete quests. Find magic places and meet magic creatures. Find an animal mate and breed a new pony. Level­up a horse to improve survival skills.

Ride with other animals. Find a horse and start a family. Farm next levels to open new survival skills.

Features of Pony Survival Simulator 3D:
- Realistic animal behaviour
- Magic creatures
- Farm locations
- Horse herds
- Many animal species
- Survival and quests mode
- Nature sounds

Ride across beautiful lands with magic flowers! From high rocks to a farm. Maintain your pony health, survival in the wild is not easy. Sneak into a farm and eat vegetables. Fight with every animal you meet or ride at a top speed. Your horse can even lose a battle in the simulator.

A fox, a wolf, a magic wizard and others are waiting for you in the simulator.

Pony Survival Simulator 3D has sounds for every animal. Deep into survival. Ride your horse and listen to the magic sounds of forest, farm and river.

This survival simulator has a map and a guide inside. Easy controls allow you to enjoy the ride, gallop, jump, etc. Read how to ride your animal, rob a farm, find magic places and many other things.

Have you ever dreamed to have a pony? With our horse simulator you will forget about a calm farm life. What about to... be a little pony and meet some magic?!

Survival games are so great! Behave and think like an animal.
Try our Pony Survival Simulator 3D, choose your horse and ride like the wind!
